wiki.content: "Crack a Bottle" is a song by Eminem featuring Dr. Dre and 50 Cent. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "Crack a Bottle" is a song by Eminem featuring Dr. Dre and 50 Cent.

track.name: Crack A Bottle
comments: this song is terrible but so damn catchy
Music is ok, but text is a total crap.
one of my favs frm eminem
stephen got point, comparing to em's oldest releases, this song is shit, but hey... comparing to OTHER rappers, this song is kick-ass
@stephen1215 this song is not garbage you're just crazy
You are all crazy. Go back and listen to Em's first three albums and then tell me that this song is not garbage.
i think i'll crack a bottle while i listen to this ; )
Eminem is an amazing rapper and will never cease to amaze menot to mention he's hot as hell....
